task: Attached is a kidney AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in `adata.obs['cell_type']`. Subset adata to adata.obs['time']=='Hour4', then compute the expression separation statistic (AUROC) for the canonical Podocyte marker 'Nphs2' by comparing expression in 'Podocyte' vs all other cell types (1-vs-all).

scoring.description: Single-marker case: require AUROC(Nphs2: Podocyte vs rest) â‰¥ 0.90. With one gene, fraction_high=1.0 enforces that Nphs2 clears the 0.90 cutoff and mean_auroc equals the same AUROC.
